add_library(sdl2mixer SHARED IMPORTED)
set_target_properties(sdl2mixer PROPERTIES
	IMPORTED_IMPLIB_DEBUG ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL2_mixerd.lib
	IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL2_mixerd.dll
	IMPORTED_IMPLIB_RELEASE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL2_mixer.lib
	IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL2_mixer.dll)

add_library(sdl2 SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
target_include_directories(sdl2 SYSTEM INTERFACE include/SDL2)
set_target_properties(sdl2 PROPERTIES
	IMPORTED_IMPLIB_DEBUG ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL2d.lib
	IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL2d.dll
	IMPORTED_IMPLIB_RELEASE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL2.lib
	IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL2.dll)
target_link_libraries(sdl2 INTERFACE sdl2mixer)

add_library(sdl2main STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
set_target_properties(sdl2main PROPERTIES
	IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL2maind.lib
	IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SDL2main.lib)
